entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 p.m. CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
